price: Òun ni Àkọ́kọ́ àti Ìkẹ́yìn. Ó hàn (pẹ̀lú àmì bíbẹ Rẹ̀). Ó sì pamọ́ (fún gbogbo ojú nílé ayé). Òun ni Onímọ̀ nípa gbogbo n̄ǹkan.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُ وَٱلۡأٓخِرُ وَٱلظَّٰهِرُ وَٱلۡبَاطِنُۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-awalu wal-ākhiru wal-ẓāhiru wal-bāṭinu wahuwa bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
